text: allaah ne tumase bahut-see ganneematon ka vaada kiya hain, jinhen tum praapt karoge. yah vijay to usane tumhen taatkaalik roop se nishchit kar dee. aur logon ke haath tumase rok die (ki ve tumapar aakraman karane ka saahas na kar saken) aur taaki eemaanavaalon ke lie ek nishaanee ho. aur vah seedhe maarg kee or tumhaara maargadarshan kare
